issue.title: [R] Add binding for coalesce()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13201](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13201). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13136 adds a `coalesce` kernel. Use this to implement a binding for the `dplyr` function `coalesce()`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13201?focusedCommentId=17384504) by Ian Cook (icook):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10751
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10751>
